ComicInfo.Summary:
Supersized issue! 56 pages for only $4.99!
This month’s issue features a brand new story by Andrew Vachss! Two great stories conclude: Michael T. Gilbert’s Mr. Monster and Dean Motter’s Mister X: Pokerface! Then, stick around for all new segments of Paul Levitz and Tim Hamilton’s Brooklyn Blood, Al Gordon and Bo Hampton’s The Once and Future Tarzan, Carla Speed McNeil’s Finder: Chase the Lady, and Rich Woodall and Craig Rousseau’s Kyrra: Alien Jungle Girl!
ContentsBrooklyn Blood Chapter 8Mister X: PokerfaceFinder: Chase the LadyKyrra: Alien Jungle GirlMr. Monster Chapter 4: The Once and Future Mr. MonsterThe Once and Future Tarzan
